thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Jamie Costello
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Jamie Costello

author: Jamie Costello
title: Jamie Costello
text: Mary gave us great customer service & found us a pair of Montana Sapphires I had been trying to find for months. They have great quality gems & always send a professional report with each stone. Would definitely recommend them to anyone! Thanks so much Mary & the Natural Sapphire Company!
